description: standing, smiling man at left, wearing a shirt with rolled-up sleeves and trousers; woman at right in profile from PL, with her head turned to face picture plane, wearing a skirt suit and tasseled shoes, holding a baby; mounted to an album page
inscription: verso in blue: Charlie, Eula, / Barbara Poole | verso in pencil: 18
markings: verso on mount, stamped in black: ORIGINAL / DISFARMER / PHOTOGRAPH
title: Standing father and mother holding baby
